TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 为报告附加属性使用范围的 .NET Framework 特性提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for .NET Framework attributes that report the use scope of attached properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `browsable`本 (和派生类) 的说明中使用的术语的含义 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 类似于给出的说明 ，但附加属性的可浏览状态与的属性信息尤其相关， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 因为附加属性主要是一种 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] (and derived classes) is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
